1232220.name: Professional Fishing 2
1232220.description:
"Professional Fishing 2" is the second installment of an exciting fishing game that takes you into the world of thrilling angling adventures. Step into the shoes of a novice angler, embarking on a journey with simple yet reliable gear. You have an old fishing rod and a reel reminiscent of the nostalgic 80s, with a slice of bread as your bait. To make your expedition more convenient, you also have a landing net and a tent that allows for relaxation and starting the game from any saved location.

The beginnings may be challenging, but as you gain experience and level up, you gradually progress in your fishing prowess. By selling the caught fish, you increase your account balance, enabling you to purchase better equipment and fishing gear. You can choose from various fishing techniques, such as float fishing, spinning, feeder, and many others. Utilize diverse lures, bait, and sonars to enhance your chances of catching bigger and more demanding fish.

The game offers numerous quests that expedite your experience and earnings. Additionally, you receive points that grant you recognition and rankings. Positive points are awarded for responsibly handling caught fish by keeping them in your keepnet or releasing them back into the wild, promoting a responsible approach to fishing and environmental stewardship.

Before you lies an expansive fishing world, teeming with captivating locations to explore. Venture into different lakes, rivers, and other aquatic areas that conceal unique fish species and secrets. To facilitate your mobility, you have access to various means of transportation, including ferries, buses, cars, and quads. You can also rent boats or acquire your own to reach remote fishing spots.

The game features two camera modes: first-person and third-person, allowing you to choose your preferred viewing perspective of your adventure. You can play both in single-player mode and in multiplayer mode, where you can encounter fellow anglers. With the new face-to-face system, you can communicate with other players and engage in competitive challenges by arranging duels based on caught fish. You can also participate in multiplayer competitions, testing your skills against other fishing enthusiasts.

Join fishing clubs or create your own angling organizations, where you can share knowledge and experiences with fellow fishing enthusiasts. Collaborate, compete, and build your reputation as a professional angler.

"Professional Fishing 2" is an adventure-packed fishing game that allows you to fulfill your dreams of catching big fish and exploring beautiful natural landscapes. Get ready for a magnificent journey that immerses you in the world of fishing like never before.
